tool.name: Tombo detect modifications
tool.description: detecting shifts in raw current signal level, indicative of non-canonical bases
tool.command:
mkdir -p ./fast5s_basedir/ &&
#if $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5s_basedir/ && #elif $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5s_basedir/ && #elif $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5s_basedir/ && #end if
#if $mode.mode_selector == 'model_sample_compare': mkdir -p ./fast5s_control/ && #if $mode.control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$mode.control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #elif $mode.control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$mode.control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #elif $mode.control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$mode.control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #end if #end if
#if $mode.mode_selector == 'level_sample_compare': mkdir -p ./fast5s_alternate/ && #if $mode.alternate_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$mode.alternate_signals' -C ./fast5s_alternate/ && #elif $mode.alternate_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$mode.alternate_signals' -C ./fast5s_alternate/ && #elif $mode.alternate_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$mode.alternate_signals' -C ./fast5s_alternate/ && #end if #end if
tombo detect_modifications $mode.mode_selector --fast5-basedirs ./fast5s_basedir/ --statistics-file-basename tdm_result $canonical_model --processes \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}
#if $fishers_method_context --fishers-method-context $fishers_method_context #end if #if $minimum_test_reads --minimum-test-reads $minimum_test_reads #end if #if str($single_read_threshold).strip(): --single-read-threshold '$single_read_threshold' #end if #if str($coverage_dampen_counts).strip(): --coverage-dampen-counts $coverage_dampen_counts #end if
#if $mode.mode_selector == 'alternative_model': --alternate-bases $mode.alternate_bases #end if
#if $mode.mode_selector == 'model_sample_compare': $mode.sample_only_estimates --control-fast5-basedirs ./fast5s_control #end if
#if $mode.mode_selector == 'level_sample_compare': --alternate-fast5-basedirs ./fast5s_alternate #end if
&&
ls -l tdm_result* && mv tdm_result* save_result.h5
## --per-read-statistics-basename PER_READ_STATISTICS_BASENAME ## Base for binary files containing per-read statistics ## from statistical testing. Filenames will be [--per- ## read-statistics-basename].[--alternate- ## bases]?.tombo.per_read_stats

param.name: mode_selector
param.label: Select detection mode
param.option: de_novo: Test for shifts in raw signal against a canonical base model.
alternative_model: Test for shifts in raw signal which match those of a specific known non-canonical base.
model_sample_compare: Test for shifts in raw signal against levels estimated from a canonical/control sample (PCR/IVT) at each reference position.
level_sample_compare: Test for shifts in raw signal against signal level distributions from a canonical/control sample (PCR/IVT) at each reference position.
aggregate_per_read_stats: Aggregate Tombo per-read statistics to produce a genomic base statistics file.

param.name: alternate_bases
param.label: Default non-standard base model for testing

param.name: sample_only_estimates
param.label: Only use canonical sample to estimate expected signal level and spread.
param.help: Otherwise, use canonical model to improve estimtates (esp. for low coverage regions) using baysian posterior estimates.

param.name: fishers_method_context
param.label: Number of context bases up and downstream over which to compute Fisher's method combined p-values
param.help: Not applicable for alternative model likelihood ratio tests.

param.name: minimum_test_reads
param.label: Number of reads required at a position to perform significance testing or contribute to model estimation

param.name: single_read_threshold
param.label: P-value threshold when computing fraction of significant reads at each genomic position
param.help: If two values are provided, statistics between these values are not considered. Default thresholds: DNA:0.15-0.5, RNA:0.05-0.4

param.name: coverage_dampen_counts
param.label: Dampen fraction modified estimates for low coverage sites
param.help: Two parameters are unmodified and modified pseudo read counts. This is equivalent to a beta prior on the fraction estimate. Set to '0 0' to disable dampened fraction estimation. Default: '2 0'

tool.help: Perform statistical testing to detect non-standard nucleotides. usage: tombo detect_modifications {de_novo,alternative_model,model_sample_compare,level_sample_compare,aggregate_per_read_stats} de_novo Test for shifts in raw signal against a canonical base model. alternative_model Test for shifts in raw signal which match those of a specific known non-canonical base. model_sample_compare Test for shifts in raw signal against levels estimated from a canonical/control sample (PCR/IVT) at each reference position. level_sample_compare Test for shifts in raw signal against signal level distributions from a canonical/control sample (PCR/IVT) at each reference position. aggregate_per_read_stats Aggregate Tombo per-read statistics to produce a genomic base statistics file.
